INTJ.title: The Architect
INTJ.overview: Independent, strategic, and determined innovators with a natural ability to turn theories into solid plans of action. INTJs value knowledge, competence, and structure, driven to understand how things work and to improve systems.
strengths: High standards and commitment to improvement
weaknesses: Can be overly critical and dismissive
Perfectionist tendencies can lead to frustration

cognitive_stack.dominant: Ni (Introverted Intuition) - Sees patterns and future implications
cognitive_stack.auxiliary: Te (Extraverted Thinking) - Organizes the external world logically
cognitive_stack.inferior: Se (Extraverted Sensing) - Awareness of present moment

INTJ.relationship_style: INTJs approach relationships with the same strategic thinking they apply elsewhere. They seek intellectual equals and value deep, meaningful connections over superficial interactions.

INTP.title: The Thinker
INTP.overview: Philosophical innovators fascinated by logical analysis, systems, and design. INTPs are preoccupied with theory and search for the universal law behind everything they see. They want to understand the unifying themes of life.
weaknesses: Can be insensitive to others' feelings
INTP.relationship_style: INTPs value intellectual connection above all. They need partners who can engage in deep philosophical discussions and respect their need for independence and mental space.

ENTJ.title: The Commander
ENTJ.overview: Bold, imaginative, and strong-willed leaders who always find a way or make one. ENTJs are natural-born leaders with charisma and confidence, projecting authority in a way that draws crowds together behind a common goal.

cognitive_stack.dominant: Te (Extraverted Thinking) - Organizes external world efficiently
cognitive_stack.tertiary: Se (Extraverted Sensing) - Engages with present reality
cognitive_stack.inferior: Fi (Introverted Feeling) - Personal values and emotions

ENTJ.relationship_style: ENTJs seek partners who are independent, intelligent, and growth-oriented. They value honesty and direct communication, expecting their partners to challenge them intellectually.

ENTP.title: The Debater
ENTP.overview: Smart and curious thinkers who cannot resist an intellectual challenge. ENTPs are inspired innovators, motivated to find new solutions to intellectually challenging problems. They are curious and clever.
ENTP.relationship_style: ENTPs need intellectual stimulation and enjoy partners who can engage in witty banter and philosophical debates. They value independence and mental agility in relationships.

INFJ.title: The Advocate
INFJ.overview: Quiet and mystical, yet very inspiring and tireless idealists. INFJs are creative nurturers with a strong sense of personal integrity and a drive to help others realize their potential.

cognitive_stack.dominant: Ni (Introverted Intuition) - Sees patterns and meanings

INFJ.relationship_style: INFJs seek deep, meaningful connections and are highly selective about their partners. They need emotional intimacy and value authenticity above all else.

INFP.title: The Mediator
INFP.overview: Poetic, kind, and altruistic people, always eager to help a good cause. INFPs are imaginative idealists guided by their own core values and beliefs. They see potential for a better future.
INFP.relationship_style: INFPs are deeply romantic and seek soulmate connections. They need partners who appreciate their depth, support their dreams, and share their values.

ENFJ.title: The Protagonist
ENFJ.overview: Charismatic and inspiring leaders, able to mesmerize their listeners. ENFJs are idealist organizers driven to implement their vision of what is best for humanity. They act as catalysts for human growth.
ENFJ.relationship_style: ENFJs are devoted partners who prioritize their relationships. They seek harmony and deep emotional connections, often putting their partner's needs first.

ENFP.title: The Campaigner
ENFP.overview: Enthusiastic, creative, and sociable free spirits who can always find a reason to smile. ENFPs are people-centered creators with a focus on possibilities and a contagious enthusiasm for new ideas.
ENFP.relationship_style: ENFPs are passionate and affectionate partners who seek deep connections. They need freedom to explore while maintaining emotional intimacy with their partner.

ISTJ.title: The Logistician
ISTJ.overview: Practical and fact-oriented individuals, whose reliability cannot be doubted. ISTJs are responsible organizers driven to create and enforce order within systems and institutions.

cognitive_stack.dominant: Si (Introverted Sensing) - Compares present to past

ISTJ.relationship_style: ISTJs are loyal and dependable partners who value stability and tradition. They show love through acts of service and appreciate partners who respect their need for routine.

ISFJ.title: The Defender
ISFJ.overview: Very dedicated and warm protectors, always ready to defend their loved ones. ISFJs are industrious caretakers, loyal to traditions and organizations. They are practical, compassionate, and caring.
ISFJ.relationship_style: ISFJs are devoted and caring partners who prioritize their loved ones' needs. They value stability and show affection through practical support and acts of service.

ESTJ.title: The Executive
ESTJ.overview: Excellent administrators, unsurpassed at managing things or people. ESTJs are hardworking traditionalists, eager to take charge in organizing projects and people to get things done.

cognitive_stack.dominant: Te (Extraverted Thinking) - Organizes the external world
cognitive_stack.auxiliary: Si (Introverted Sensing) - Relies on past experience

ESTJ.relationship_style: ESTJs are traditional partners who value commitment and stability. They show love through providing security and taking care of practical matters.

ESFJ.title: The Consul
ESFJ.overview: Extraordinarily caring, social, and popular people, always eager to help. ESFJs are conscientious helpers, sensitive to the needs of others and energetically dedicated to their responsibilities.
ESFJ.relationship_style: ESFJs are caring and supportive partners who prioritize harmony and emotional connection. They express love through acts of service and quality time.

ISTP.title: The Virtuoso
ISTP.overview: Bold and practical experimenters, masters of all kinds of tools. ISTPs are observant artisans with an understanding of mechanics and an interest in troubleshooting.
ISTP.relationship_style: ISTPs are independent partners who show love through actions rather than words. They need space and appreciate partners who respect their autonomy.

ISFP.title: The Adventurer
ISFP.overview: Flexible and charming artists, always ready to explore and experience something new. ISFPs are gentle caretakers who live in the present moment and enjoy their surroundings with cheerful, low-key enthusiasm.
ISFP.relationship_style: ISFPs are warm and considerate partners who express love through thoughtful gestures. They need emotional space and appreciate partners who support their creative expression.

ESTP.title: The Entrepreneur
ESTP.overview: Smart, energetic, and very perceptive people who truly enjoy living on the edge. ESTPs are energetic thrillseekers who are at their best when putting out fires, literal or metaphorical.

cognitive_stack.dominant: Se (Extraverted Sensing) - Lives in the moment

ESTP.relationship_style: ESTPs are exciting and spontaneous partners who keep relationships fresh. They express love through shared adventures and physical affection.

ESFP.title: The Entertainer
ESFP.overview: Spontaneous, energetic, and enthusiastic people who love life and everything it has to offer. ESFPs are vivacious entertainers who charm and engage those around them with enthusiasm and humor.

cognitive_stack.dominant: Se (Extraverted Sensing) - Experiences the present fully
cognitive_stack.auxiliary: Fi (Introverted Feeling) - Personal values guide decisions

ESFP.relationship_style: ESFPs are affectionate and fun-loving partners who bring joy and spontaneity to relationships. They express love through quality time and creating memorable experiences.
